channel.title: Comments on: Copying environment variables in Apache – solving the AUTH_USER Apache/IIS issue
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: John Sieber
item.dc:creator: John Sieber
item.description: Great tip! I did not realize that IIS and Apache use different cgi variables for authenticated user name storage. I&apos;m sure I will run into this one of these days.
item.content:encoded: Great tip! I did not realize that IIS and Apache use different cgi variables for authenticated user name storage. I'm sure I will run into this one of these days.

item.title: By: Jake
item.dc:creator: Jake
item.description: Very nice, Ryan.  This worked like a charm
item.content:encoded: Very nice, Ryan.  This worked like a charm
